description: Allows the creeper to swell up when a player is nearby. It can only be used by Creepers.
title: Swell

start_distance.description: This mob starts swelling when a target is at least this many blocks away.
start_distance.title: Start Distance

stop_distance.description: This mob stops swelling when a target has moved away at least this many blocks.
stop_distance.title: Stop Distance
